cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikoshi

sentence.kanji: 去年、引っ越ししました。
sentence.romaji: kyonen hikoshi shimashita
sentence.english: I moved last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiraseru

sentence.kanji: 皆に会議の日にちを知らせた。
sentence.romaji: minna ni kaigi no hinichi wo shiraseta
sentence.english: I informed everyone of the day of the meeting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ataeru

sentence.kanji: そのニュースは彼に大きなショックを与えた。
sentence.romaji: sono nyu-su ha kare ni ooki na shoku wo ataeta
sentence.english: The news gave him a great shock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuyosa

sentence.kanji: 風の強さに驚きました。
sentence.romaji: kaze no tsuyosa ni odorokimashita
sentence.english: I was surprised by the strength of the wind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juudou

sentence.kanji: 私は柔道を習っています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha juudou wo narate imasu
sentence.english: I'm learning judo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yawaraka

sentence.kanji: 彼の声は柔らかだ。
sentence.romaji: kare no koe ha yawaraka da
sentence.english: His voice is gentle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wakasu

sentence.kanji: お湯を沸かしてください。
sentence.romaji: oyu wo wakashite kudasai
sentence.english: Please boil the water.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yawarakai

sentence.kanji: 布団がとても柔らかい。
sentence.romaji: futon ga totemo yawarakai
sentence.english: The futon is very soft.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikidashi

sentence.kanji: 財布は引き出しの中にあります。
sentence.romaji: saifu ha hikidashi no naka ni arimasu
sentence.english: My purse is in the drawer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's waku

sentence.kanji: お風呂が沸きました。
sentence.romaji: o furo ga wakimashita。
sentence.english: The bath is ready.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aisatsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は笑顔で挨拶した。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha egao de aisatsu shita
sentence.english: She greeted me with a smile.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikosu

sentence.kanji: 来月、大阪に引っ越します。
sentence.romaji: raigetsu oosaka ni hikoshimasu
sentence.english: I'll move to Osaka next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yogore

sentence.kanji: 靴の汚れを落としました。
sentence.romaji: kutsu no yogore wo otoshimashita
sentence.english: I cleaned the dirt off the shoes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ago

sentence.kanji: 顎が痛い。
sentence.romaji: ago ga itai
sentence.english: My jaw hurts.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaihi

sentence.kanji: 会費が少し高いね。
sentence.romaji: kaihi ga sukoshi takai ne
sentence.english: The fee is a little high.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouhi

sentence.kanji: 日本は消費大国といわれています。
sentence.romaji: nipon ha shouhi taikoku to iwarete imasu
sentence.english: It is said that Japan is a consumption giant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiriau

sentence.kanji: お二人はどこで知り合ったのですか。
sentence.romaji: ofutari ha doko de shiriata no desu ka
sentence.english: Where did you two get to know each other?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shireru

sentence.kanji: 他人に知れるとまずいことになるわね。
sentence.romaji: tanin ni shireru to mazui koto ni naru wa ne
sentence.english: This would be terrible if others found out about it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shirase

sentence.kanji: 今日、合格の知らせをもらいました。
sentence.romaji: kyou goukaku no shirase wo moraimashita
sentence.english: Today I received a notice that I passed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's higaeri

sentence.kanji: 私たちは日帰りで京都に行きました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha higaeri de kyouto ni ikimashita
sentence.english: We went to Kyoto on a day trip.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaesu

sentence.kanji: 学校は生徒たちを午前中に帰したね。
sentence.romaji: gakou ha seitotachi wo gozenchuu ni kaeshita ne
sentence.english: The school dismissed students in the morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuyomaru

sentence.kanji: 雨はだんだん強まります。
sentence.romaji: ame ha dandan tsuyomarimasu
sentence.english: The rain has been gradually getting stronger.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuyomeru

sentence.kanji: 火を強めてください。
sentence.romaji: hi wo tsuyomete kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn the heat up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuiyasu

sentence.kanji: 私は語学の勉強にかなりの時間を費やしています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha gogaku no benkyou ni kanari no jikan wo tsuiyashite imasu
sentence.english: I have spent considerable time on language study.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yowamaru

sentence.kanji: 夜になって風が弱まったね。
sentence.romaji: yoru ni nate kaze ga yowamata ne
sentence.english: The wind dropped at night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yowameru

sentence.kanji: 火を弱めてください。
sentence.romaji: hi wo yowamete kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn down the heat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jibiki

sentence.kanji: この漢字を字引で引いてみて。
sentence.romaji: kono kanji wo jibiki de hiite mite
sentence.english: Look up this kanji in the dictionary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikiukeru

sentence.kanji: 新しい仕事を引き受けたよ。
sentence.romaji: atarashii shigoto wo hikiuketa yo
sentence.english: I accepted the new job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikidasu

sentence.kanji: 先生が私の能力を引き出してくれました。
sentence.romaji: sensei ga watashi no nouryoku wo hikidashitekuremashita
sentence.english: The teacher was able to draw out my abilities.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nebiki

sentence.kanji: あと1000円値引きしましょう。
sentence.romaji: ato 1000 en nebiki shimashou
sentence.english: I'll further discount the price by 1,000 yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikitomeru

sentence.kanji: 帰ろうとする友達を引き止めたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kaerou to suru tomodachi wo hikitometa n da
sentence.english: I stalled my friend who was about to go home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikiwake

sentence.kanji: この勝負は引き分けです。
sentence.romaji: kono shoubu ha hikiwake desu
sentence.english: This match is a tie.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikikaesu

sentence.kanji: 雨が強かったので引き返したよ。
sentence.romaji: ame ga tsuyokata no de hikikaeshita yo
sentence.english: I turned back because it was raining heavily.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiyou

sentence.kanji: イタリア旅行の費用は30万円です。
sentence.romaji: itaria ryokou no hiyou ha 30 manen desu
sentence.english: The cost of the trip to Italy is 300,000 yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryohi

sentence.kanji: 父が旅費を出してくれました。
sentence.romaji: chichi ga ryohi wo dashite kuremashita
sentence.english: My father paid for my travel expenses.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daiichi

sentence.kanji: 私には仕事が第一です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ni ha shigoto ga daiichi desu
sentence.english: My first priority is my job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jakuten

sentence.kanji: 彼の弱点はスタミナが足りないところです。
sentence.romaji: kare no jakuten ha sutamina ga tarinai tokoro desu
sentence.english: His weakness is that he lacks stamina.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saikyou

sentence.kanji: 彼は最強チームの一員です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha saikyou chi-mu no ichiin desu
sentence.english: He is a member of the strongest team.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chiji

sentence.kanji: 彼は有能な知事ね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yuunou na chiji ne
sentence.english: He's a capable governor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikitoru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は息子を引き取ったの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha musuko wo hikitota no
sentence.english: She took custody of her son.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chijin

sentence.kanji: 彼は昔からの知人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mukashi kara no chijin desu
sentence.english: He's an old acquaintance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's inyou

sentence.kanji: 論文にその本を引用したの。
sentence.romaji: ronbun ni sono hon wo inyou shita no
sentence.english: I quoted the book in my thesis.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chiteki

sentence.kanji: 彼はすごく知的な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sugoku chiteki na hito desu
sentence.english: He's an extremely intellectual person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yowaru

sentence.kanji: 彼は病気で弱っているんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha byouki de yowate iru n da
sentence.english: He has been getting weaker due to his illness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shirazushirazu

sentence.kanji: 知らず知らずのうちに疲れがたまっていたよ。
sentence.romaji: shirazushirazu no uchi ni tsukare ga tamate ita yo
sentence.english: I got tired little by little without being aware of it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shidai

sentence.kanji: 連絡があり次第出発します。
sentence.romaji: renraku ga ari shidai shupatsu shimasu
sentence.english: I will depart once I am told.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigou

sentence.kanji: 地図にはいろいろな記号が使われているのね。
sentence.romaji: chizu ni ha iroiro na kigou ga tsukawarete iru no ne
sentence.english: A variety of symbols are used on maps.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jimu

sentence.kanji: 事務の経験が3年あります。
sentence.romaji: jimu no keiken ga sannen arimasu
sentence.english: I have three years experience in clerical work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koumuin

sentence.kanji: 私の父は公務員です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no chichi ha koumuin desu
sentence.english: My father is a civil servant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jimuin

sentence.kanji: 新しい事務員が入りました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii jimuin ga hairimashita
sentence.english: A new clerk joined the office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ninmu

sentence.kanji: 彼は最後まで自分の任務を果たした。
sentence.romaji: kare ha saigo made jibun no ninmu wo hatashita
sentence.english: He fulfilled his duties right to the end.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shidaini

sentence.kanji: その事件は次第に忘れられていったのさ。
sentence.romaji: sono jiken ha shidaini wasurerarete ita no sa
sentence.english: The incident was gradually forgotten.
